title: What to recite in sujood as sahu, sujood tilawah & sujood ash shukr? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says what what must we recite during prostration of recitation prostration of forgetfulness and prostration of gratitude all of these prostrations the default is you have to say subhanallah BL Allah minimum once you can add as many as you want and there are other voluntary as car which you can recite but they're not mandated so the default is subhana rabbi Allah like what you do regularly in your salat you can check in your fortress of the Muslim and you'll find that insha'Allah
